verses.content: Chun, hieng hi a na, hnuoi chungah mihriem an hung pung a, naunuhmeihai an hung nei tâwl chun,
Pathien naupasalhai chun mi- hriem naunuhmeihai chu hmêl ṭhatakin an hmuh a; chuongchun, an dit zâwng taphawthai chu nuhmeiah an nei tâwl hlak a.

Chun, LALPA chun, “Ka thlarau chu mihriemah chêng kumkhuo naw ni; chun mihriem chu kumkhuoin thaw rawp naw nih; ama chu tisa a ni sih a; chuongchun, a dam sûng hun khawm kum za le sâwmhni ni raw se,” a tih a.

Chuong lai chun Milienhai chu hnuoia hin an um a; chu hnunga khawm Pathien naupasalhai chun mihriem naunuhmeihai chu an pâwl a, anni leh nauhai an nei hlak lai khan, an um bawk a; chuonghai chu tienlaia mi hrât, mi hming inthanghai kha an nih.
Chun, LALPA chun hnuoia hin mihriem suolzie chu nasatak a nih ti le, a lungril ngaituonahai hrim hrim chu suol ruok a nih ti a lo hriet a.
Chuongchun, hnuoia hin mi- hriem a lo siem ta lei chun LALPA chu ân sîr a, lungril natnain a hmang pha tah a.
Chuongchun, LALPA chun, “Ka mihriem siem hi hnuoi chunga inthawk hin sukbohmang el ka tih a, mihriem dâm, sa dâm, thilhring dâm, chunglêng vate dâm chen hin; ka siem ta leiin kân sîr a nih,” a ta.
Noa ruok chun LALPA lungin- sietna a chang a.
Hienghai hi Noa thlahai chu an nih: Noa chu mi feltak a na, a dam ruolpuihai lai chun sawisêlbo a nih: Noa chu Pathien leh an lêng hmunkhat hlak.
Noa chun naupasal pathum, Sem, Ham le Japheth a nei a.
Chun, hnuoi hi Pathien mit- hmuin a se zo tah a, hnuoi hi inpâwngnêknain a sip zo ta bawk a.
Chun, Pathienin hnuoi hi a en a; chun, ngai ta, a se zo tah: tisa po poin hnuoia hin an umdân an suksiet zo ta sih a.
Chun, Pathienin Noa kuoma chun, “Tisa po po suktâwpna ding thu ka sukthlûk tah: anni leiin hnuoi hi inpâwngnêknain a sip zo ta sih a: chuongchun, ngai ta, a hnuoi pumin ka sukbohmang ding a nih.
I ta dingin fâr thingin lawng siem rawh: lawnga chun pindan- hai siem i ta, a puo tieng le a sûng tieng chu fâr hnai nâl vawng bawk i tih.
Hi hi i siem dân ding chu a nih: lawng dung tieng chu tawng za thum ni sienla, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmnga, ân sâng tieng chu tawng sâwmthum ni raw se.

Lawnga chun tukver siem i ta, a chung tieng tawng khat chinah i zo ding a nih; chun, lawng kawtkhâr chu a pangah i hawng ding a nih; sâwng hnuoihnung le sâwng hnina le sâwng thumna neiin i siem ding a nih.
Chun, ngai ta, keima ngeiin, tisa po po hringna thuoka inthuok taphawt chu vân hnuoia inthawka sukbohmang dingin hnuoia hin tui ka suklêt ding a nih; hnuoia thil tinrêng um hi thi vawng an tih.
Amiruokchu, ka thuthlung chu i kuomah sukdet lem ka tih, lawnga chun i lût ding a nih, nang lût i ta, i naupasalhai leh, i nuhmei leh, i nauhai nuhmeihai khawm i kuomah an lût ve ding a nih.
Chun, tisa po poa thilhring tinrêng laia mi, chi tin pahni peiin i kuoma a hringa um ve dingin lawnga chun i ṭhuoi lût ding a nih, a pui le a chal an ni seng ding a nih.

Vatehai anni chi umdân ang sengin, ranhai anni chi umdân ang sengin, thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâk chi tinrêng anni chi umdân ang sengin, chi tin pahni pei a hringa um dingin, i kuomah an hung ve ding a nih.
Chun, bu fâk hlak ang chi po po la la, i kuomah sie khâwm rawh; chuongchun, nangni le anni ta dingin bu nîng a tih,” a ta.
Chuong ang chun Noa chun a thawh a, Pathienin a kuoma thu a pêk po po ang ngei chun a thaw tah a.
